title: Forbes Blockchain 50 2023
author: Nina Bambysheva
description: Despite 2022’s crypto market collapse, dozens of enterprises around the world are still investing in blockchain, the distributed-database technology that underpins the entire sector because it helps their businesses operate better, faster or cheaper.

title: Leak Reveals ‘Enormous’ China Earthquake Could Be About To Hit The Price Of Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, XRP, Cardano, Dogecoin, Polygon And Solana
author: Billy Bambrough
description: The chief executive of the stablecoin issuer Circle, Jeremy Allaire, who oversees the $28 billion USDC stablecoin, has said he sees "enormous demand" for digital assets in emerging markets, with China and Asia at  the "center"...

title: Asian Billionaires’ Hotel Groups Build Virtual Lands In Decentraland And The Sandbox’s Metaverse
author: Zinnia Lee
description: Singaporean billionaire Kwek Leng Beng’s Millennium Hotels and Resorts and the billionaire Lo family’s Regal Hotels Group in Hong Kong are taking their first steps into the metaverse after purchasing virtual properties in blockchain gaming platforms Decentraland and the Sandbox.

title: Crossing The Crypto Threshold: Brazil’s NuBank Launches Nucoin
author: Meaghan Johnson
description: HEADLINER Brazil's Nubank has made headlines this week with the launch of its very own cryptocurrency, Nucoin.

title: Binance Appoints Two Africans To Its Global Advisory Board
author: Oluwaseun Adeyanju
description: The board, consisting of 11 members, will advise Binance on issues relating to regulation, politics and society, according to a statement from the company.
